title: BRIEF-Australian Ethical Says It Pledged To Protect 5 Acres Of Peruvian Amazon Rainforest
text:
BRIEF-Australian Ethical Says It Pledged To Protect 5 Acres Of Peruvian Amazon Rainforest

Stock Markets 22 minutes ago (Sep 20, 2019 09:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Australian Ethical Says It Pledged To Protect 5 Acres Of Peruvian Amazon Rainforest Sept 20 (Reuters) - Australian Ethical Investment Ltd : * AUSTRALIAN ETHICAL SAYS IT PLEDGED TO PROTECT 5 ACRES OF PERUVIAN AMAZON RAINFOREST AMID WORLD STRIKE TO RAISE AWARENESS OF GLOBAL CLIMATE EMERGENCY Further company coverage: AEF.AX
